dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey there, and welcome back to the podcast! So, Host_B, have you heard about this new digital card making waves?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey there, and welcome back to the podcast! So, Host B, have you heard about this new digital card making waves?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I think so. Is it the Tayyab card? I saw something, um, about it being the first Islamic digital card in Kazakhstan?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I think so. Is it the Tayyab card? I saw something, um, about it being the first Islamic digital card in Kazakhstan?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The card was launched by the first Kazakhstan Islamic fintech Tayyab in partnership with Bank RBK and the VISA payment system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's the one! It's pretty interesting, actually. What makes it "Islamic," first off, is that it, uh, doesn't generate interest income, and they don't charge any interest on your balances.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the one! It's pretty interesting, actually. What makes it Islamic, first off, is that it, uh, doesn't generate interest income, and they don't charge any interest on your balances.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Customer card balances are not used to generate interest income, and interest is not charged on them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. So, like, fully Shariah-compliant. Is that, um, certified by someone?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. So, like, fully Shariah-compliant. Is that, um, certified by someone?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, absolutely. It's confirmed by the international Shariah Review Bureau from Saudi Arabia, and also the Spiritual Administration of the Muslims of Kazakhstan. Pretty solid backing there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, absolutely. It's confirmed by the international Shariah Review Bureau from Saudi Arabia, and also the Spiritual Administration of the Muslims of Kazakhstan. Pretty solid backing there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Compliance with the principles of Islamic finance is confirmed by the international Shariah Board Shariyah Review Bureau (Saudi Arabia), as well as the Spiritual Administration of the Muslims of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's good to know. How do you even get one of these, though? Is it a whole, like, application process?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's good to know. How do you even get one of these, though? Is it a whole, like, application process?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nah, it's super easy. You just download the Tayyab mobile app from the Apple Store or Play Market, and you can issue the card, uh, in a minute.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nah, it's super easy. You just download the Tayyab mobile app from the Apple Store or Play Market, and you can issue the card, uh, in a minute.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can issue the card in a minute by installing the mobile application Tayyab in Apple store or Play market.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, a minute? That's fast. And then you can, like, use it right away?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, a minute? That's fast. And then you can, like, use it right away?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! Instant transfers and contactless payments worldwide using Apple Pay and Samsung Pay. And if you want a physical card, you can order a plastic VISA that's even hand-delivered.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! Instant transfers and contactless payments worldwide using Apple Pay and Samsung Pay. And if you want a physical card, you can order a plastic V I S A that's even hand-delivered.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Instant transfers and contactless payments can be made immediately worldwide using Apple pay and Samsung pay wallets. If necessary, you can order a plastic VISA card with hand delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's [interrupts] neat. So you can still get a physical one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's neat. So you can still get a physical one.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Plus, you can store money in four currencies: KZT, USD, EUR, and RUB. And, uh, you can withdraw cash from any ATM globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Plus, you can store money in four currencies: K Z T, U S D, E U R, and R U B. And, uh, you can withdraw cash from any A T M globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can store money in four currencies Kazakhstan KZT, USD, EUR, RUB, and you can withdraw cash at any ATM in the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so it’s a fully functional card then. But besides the no-interest thing, what else makes it, um, specifically Islamic?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so it's a fully functional card then. But besides the no-interest thing, what else makes it, um, specifically Islamic?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: This is where it gets really cool, I think. Beyond the financial stuff, the Tayyab app actually helps you practice your Islamic way of life. You can find the nearest mosque or halal cafe, it has prayer times, a Qibla compass, Zikr counter, even a Zakat calculator.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This is where it gets really cool, I think. Beyond the financial stuff, the Tayyab app actually helps you practice your Islamic way of life. You can find the nearest mosque or halal cafe, it has prayer times, a Qibla compass, Zikr counter, even a Zakat calculator.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition to the convenience of using financial functions in line with the latest world trends, we provide our users with a convenient service for practicing the Islamic way of life, for example, only in the tayyab application you can easily find the nearest mosque, prayer room or halal cafe. The application also has prayer times and Azan, Qibla compass, Zikr counter, Zakat calculator and much more notes Daniyar Uspanov, Tayyab CEO.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's pretty comprehensive! So it’s not just a card, it’s like a whole, uh, lifestyle app. But with that, are there any restrictions on what you *can't* use it for?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's pretty comprehensive! So it's not just a card, it's like a whole, uh, lifestyle app. But with that, are there any restrictions on what you can't use it for?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, there are. It's not for payments in casinos, gambling or lottery establishments, or specialized stores selling alcohol and tobacco. But, um, it's totally fine for department stores that sell groceries, or restaurants and cafes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, there are. It's not for payments in casinos, gambling or lottery establishments, or specialized stores selling alcohol and tobacco. But, um, it's totally fine for department stores that sell groceries, or restaurants and cafes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Additional features of Tayyab first digital Islamic card are that it is not intended for payment in casinos, as well as in any gambling and lottery establishments, specialized stores selling alcohol and tobacco products, while the restriction does not apply to department stores selling groceries. The card is not intended to pay for goods and services in bars and nightclubs, and the restriction does not apply to restaurants and cafes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Makes total sense for a Shariah-compliant product. Who's behind this whole venture?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes total sense for a Shariah-compliant product. Who's behind this whole venture?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It was launched by the first Kazakhstan Islamic fintech, Tayyab, in partnership with Bank RBK and the VISA payment system. And one of their institutional investors is Dubai Fintech Ventures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It was launched by the first Kazakhstan Islamic fintech, Tayyab, in partnership with Bank R B K and the V I S A payment system. And one of their institutional investors is Dubai Fintech Ventures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The card was launched by the first Kazakhstan Islamic fintech Tayyab in partnership with Bank RBK and the VISA payment system. One of Tayyab's institutional investors is Dubai Fintech Ventures.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like a big deal then. When did this all, uh, kick off?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like a big deal then. When did this all, uh, kick off?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It was actually timed to coincide with Eid al-Adha this year, which was back on July 20th. Pretty smart timing, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It was actually timed to coincide with Eid al-Adha this year, which was back on July twentieth. Pretty smart timing, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The launch of the project was timed to coincide with the main Islamic holiday Eid al-Adha, which falls on July 20 this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, very clever. So, for listeners interested, where can they find more info?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, very clever. So, for listeners interested, where can they find more info?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They can download the Tayyab app on the Apple Store or Play Market, or visit their website at www.tayyab.kz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They can download the Tayyab app on the Apple Store or Play Market, or visit their website at the link.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can download the Tayyab application and issue a card on the Apple store for iPhone and Play market for Android smartphones, and for more information, visit www.tayyab.kz
